modelCreation.desc: Template for regional model creation on steady state

obsCalculated.desc: Template for comparison between observed and calculated

vtkGeneration.desc: Template for 3d geometry generation on Vtk format

multilayeredTransient.desc: Template for multilayer (15 layers) and transient (6 stress periods) regional model

seawaterIntrusion.desc: Template for seawater intrusion modeling using the BUY package
